item.title: Asset-backed finance is growing fast and drawing new scrutiny
item.description: ABF involves lending against a specific asset, income stream, or loan rather than lending to a company based on its cash flow.

item.title: Why aspirational luxury shopping is losing steam — and what’s ahead in 2026
item.description: 2026 could be another year of winners and losers in luxury, J.P. Morgan says.

item.title: Inside the $6 trillion ABF loan market: Here's what to know
item.description: CNBC's Robert Frank joins 'Squawk Box' with the latest news.

item.title: Tax impact on wealth giving season: Here's what to know
item.description: Changes to U.S. tax law could lead to a surge in charitable giving this year. CNBC's Robert Frank joins 'Squawk Box' with the details.

item.title: Manhattan condo values fell over the past decade. Here's why rents are still rising
item.description: More wealthy New Yorkers are choosing to rent as condos lose value in Manhattan.
